data.Title: Google Search Notes Feature Discontinued
data.Description: Google has officially ended its experiment with the Search Notes feature, which allowed users to add notes to search results. The feature was part of Google Search Labs and was designed to explore how people engage with information from others. Google's research indicated that users prefer to hear from similar individuals, and Notes was an exploration into that concept.

data.Title: Google to Release New Core Update in Coming Weeks
data.Description: Google has announced a new core update scheduled for release in the coming weeks. This update follows the March 2024 core update, and many websites are still awaiting recoveries from the September 2023 helpful content update.

data.Title: Google Tests AI Overviews on Workspace Accounts
data.Description: Google is expanding its testing of AI Overviews to include Workspace accounts. This expansion has been observed in various regions, including the UK.

data.Title: Google Merchant Center Next Rolls Out to All Merchants
data.Description: Google has begun rolling out the new Google Merchant Center Next to all merchants. The updated platform features a redesigned user interface, enhanced features, and new functionalities.

data.Title: Google Business Profiles Chat Feature Discontinued
data.Description: Google has removed the chat feature from Google Business Profiles. Users are no longer able to initiate new chats, and Google advises downloading chat history before the feature is entirely phased out.

data.Title: Google Explores Renaming "Short Videos" to "Quick Takes"
data.Description: Google is experimenting with a change in terminology for short-form video content, potentially renaming "short videos" to "quick takes."

data.Title: Google Ads Tests Query Refinements for Ad Carousels
data.Description: Google is conducting tests on query refinements specifically for ad carousel placements within its advertising platform.

data.Title: Anthropic Releases Claude App for Android
data.Description: Anthropic has launched an Android app for its AI chatbot, Claude. The app allows users to synchronize conversations across devices, upload images and files for real-time analysis, and interact with the AI assistant on the go.

data.Title: Taboola Partners with Apple for Native Advertising
data.Description: Taboola has secured a deal with Apple to provide native advertising within the Apple News and Apple Stocks apps. This partnership marks a significant step for Taboola in expanding its reach within Apple's ecosystem.
